posts.message:
عملت chrome extension جديد. 
اسمة : Social Filter 
عمرك زهقت من الى بيحرقو الافلام او يوم تحفيل عالزمالك او مواضيع سياسية مستفزة و تحب تخفى البوستات دى كلها. جه الحل... 
عملت ال extension لحل المشكلة دى...
ومهمته إخفاء المواضيع إلى انت مش عاوزها من على (الفيس,التويتر,يوتيوب,جوجل,ريدات)... كل إلى عليك تكتب الكلمات الى تخص الموضوع. و البرنامج هيخفى اى موضوع يحتوى على الكلمات دى...
 
اتفضلو الرابط أهو... 
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/social-filter/pahdoafacnmoblppkhfjaicdmlkplinj

I developed a new chrome extension called: Social Filter

Internet is filled with ADs & stuff you don't want to see Like spoilers, Ads or celebrity you don't want to hear about. 
hide them all with our plugin. you choose the keywords you don't want to see & we hide topics that contains that word from your browser view. don't worry you still can read them if you hover over the red hidden mark.

It works with: Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, Google-Plus, Riddit.
posts.caption: chrome.google.com
posts.description: Hides posts & tweets with specific words & users on all social websites.

ال voip هيتقفل تماما في شهر 6   فا احنا كgeeks nبدل منشتكب نقدر نعمل بروتكول مختلف و يا ريت يعتمد علي البروتوكولس الموجودة زي http او ال SSH و انا فاهم ان احنا لازم نعتمد علي سرفيرس علشان نترجم الكلام دة و نبعتة ك voip عادي بس برضو ممكن نلف حوليها 
بس من الاخر how is with me

Optimisation Skills for every Good Front End. You should learn this and read beyond these articles:

What Every Frontend Developer Should Know About Webpage Rendering: http://frontendbabel.info/articles/webpage-rendering-101/

PageSpeed Insights Rules: https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/insights/rules

How Smashing magazine achieved 100/100 score on Google Speed Insight:  https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2014/09/improving-smashing-magazine-performance-case-study/

Smashing Magazine Results See and Learn: https://developers.google.com/speed/pagespeed/insights/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.smashingmagazine.com&tab=mobile

Presentation on automating front end Optimisations: https://speakerdeck.com/matija/automatize-frontend-optimizations

I had a problem configuring PHPMailer on my godaddy server, although it works fine on my localhost but on the server it show : SMTP connect() failed
I tried several solves and reached that I should use my goddady STMP info to connect to SMTP now I got the error : SMTP -> get_lines(): $data is "*****************.****.secureserver.net
I googled it and reached that it might be a problem with auth or ssl but I can't find a sovle :) any help !

I need your opinion about cheapest Parse replacement. I investigated a lot in this topic but what I was getting as free at Parse will cost me now 100-200$ monthly in alternative solutions. 
requirements:
- I serve 4 million requests per month serving only 20 000 users
- db is 2 GB
- I use cloud code / scheduled jobs / push notifications / social authentication.
Numbers mentioned above will increase with the increase of users.
Hope you can help. Thanks in advance.

السلام عليكم. كنت محتاج اتعلم ازاى اعمل mobile app. تركيزى كله عالاندرويد... 
ادامى طريقين و محتار مابينهم... 
React native ولا ال native android development...
انا عندى خلفية كويسة فى الاتنين. بس معملتش بيهم برامج نهاءى. طبعا مش هينفع اذاكر الاتنين.. 
طبيعى ميال لل react way لانها اسهل. بس لسة محتار...
سؤالى هنا يا ترى ما هى ال react native limitations in creating android app ???
و هل فى مميزات ضخمة فى واحد عن التانى تخليه يكسب الاختيار ؟؟؟

Hey WordPress gurus,

What's the latest and greatest WordPress backup / import-export plugin or tooling of the day in April 2016?

(Database, themes, plugins, extra files, and posts)

P.S.
I could obviously google for tools that do this. I'm flooded with results though. I was hoping for first hand experimenters recommendations instead of just more help googling.

Thanks a lot :)
